TEXT.TITLE: FREEDOM FEDERAL <FRFE> TO RECOGNIZE GAIN
TEXT.BODY: Freedom Federal Savings Bank said it will recognize in its first-quarter earnings a previously deferred 1.5 mln dlr gain which resulted from the sale of an apartment complex in 1983. It said the recognition comes as a result of repayment of a loan which was granted when the complex was sold. Reuter
